name: Call of the Cars
description:
Summary

Call of the Cars is a unique horror experience where the player takes over the role of a self-driving car, dumped in a junkyard for making a moral choice.

Find your way out of the junkyard, narrowly surviving the machinery and environments that seek to destroy you.

This is a demo, meant to give an impression of what the full game could be.

We hope you enjoy it, thanks for checking it out!

Team Anna LubbersCharacter Design & 2D ArtNiki van der KuilEnvironment DesignRobbert LeenenProgrammingThomas van EekelenGame & Level DesignWouter EnsinkAudio Design &  Music
